testcase.name: Verify order should be able to place successfully on Swag Labs
testcase.system-out: Given User navigates to the Swag Labs login page............................passed When User enters a valid username...........................................passed And User enters a valid password............................................passed And User clicks on the login button.........................................passed When User added few items into shopping cart................................passed And User clicks on shopping cart icon.......................................passed Then User should be on shopping cart page...................................passed When User clicks Checkout button............................................passed Then User should be on Checkout page........................................passed When User fill required details and clicks continue button..................passed Then User should be on Checkout Overview details page.......................passed When User clicks finish button..............................................passed Then User should be on Checkout completed page..............................passed

testcase.name: Add few Items into Swag Labs Shopping Cart
testcase.system-out: Given User navigates to the Swag Labs login page............................passed When User enters a valid username...........................................passed And User enters a valid password............................................passed And User clicks on the login button.........................................passed When User added few items into shopping cart................................passed And User clicks on shopping cart icon.......................................passed Then User should be on shopping cart page...................................passed When User removed few items from the shopping cart..........................passed Then User should be able to see the items count on the shopping cart as 1...passed When User clicks on continue shopping button................................passed Then User should be logged in to the Swag Labs account......................passed
